channel.title: i cannot go on xen!!!
channel.description: Hello everybody!! so i'm stuck at the lambda core, in front of the last teleport, the one that should bring me on xen; but when the scientist tell me that it's ready, and i jump in it, the game ends and shows the credits!!! It's normal or there's something wrong?

item.title: i cannot go on xen!!!
item.dc:creator: Lost_one
item.description:
Pretty much, Xen isn’t complete yet. They’re extending that and adding it on as part 2. once complete it will give you about a solid 20 hours experience for the whole game. Just enjoy as it is for now, and when part 2 is done, they’ll release it in an update and we’ll have the whole experience.

Read full topic

item.title: i cannot go on xen!!!
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
cman2k:
  • On September 14th you will see the first release of Black Mesa! This will include our re-envisioning of Half-Life all the way up to Lambda Core. We believe this is a great way to provide a complete-feeling 8-10 hour experience with a solid ending, make our fans happy and help us make the best overall game possible.

Read full topic

now yes…thanks XD
